overview: A true trilogy of terror! Welcome to the haunted dollhouse where 3 devilish tales of twisted horror take place. From a re-animated rag doll that seeks revenge to a child's doll graveyard where angry playthings come back to life - enter the world of Devil Dolls!  Re-edited versions of:  Demonic Toys /  Dangerous Worry Dolls /  Skullheads
title: DevilDolls
